A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was extremely well put together.. great performances.. great writing at some points... very daring and different... but where it falls short... it falls really short. Leia in space\, novice turned MASTER Rey\, Master turned novice Kylo\, Pointless Snoke\, cowardly homicidal dissapearing Luke and worst of all... blasphemous bible burning Yoda cannot be overlooked... Such a missed opportunity... makes me appreciate what Lucas did with the prequels so much more
